div1.p: Read refers to Henry Rose Carter's illness. Rose is on vacation in Maine.

September 16, 1921
Dear Miss Carter:
div1.p:
Your letter of September 14 was re-
ceived this morning. I am sorry to know that
your father has been ill. I do not wonder
that you are concerned about him because ap-
parently he never spares himself when there
is work to do. I hope that he will soon be
entirely recovered.

Mr Rose is at present in Maine on
his vacation. We expect that he will return
to New York early in October.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Florence M. Read Miss Laura Armistead Carter
New Glasgow P O
Amherst County
Virginia
